main.node: Log the question and answer into the sheet

name: Log Question and Answers into Sheet

values.content: Convert the input into clean plain text. Remove all line breaks, emojis, icons, markdown formatting, and extra spaces. Return a single continuous paragraph suitable for saving in Google Sheets
